update.description:
* //////////NEW\\\\\\\\\\ - Multiple Server redundancy is now enabled for both files and the database. - Total re-design from the ground up. - Database driven backend to ensure reliability. - Startup speed significantly incresed.
//////////NOTES\\\\\\\\\\ DankDroneDownloader 1.x will stop functioning on the 30th of November 2019. Please ensure you accept this update to continue to use the app.
